greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: n followed by (n - sum of digits of n).
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: If n is even, a(n) = n/2; if n is odd, a(n) = A066568(floor(n/2)). - _Michel Marcus_, Aug 14 2013
program: (PARI) a(n) = if (n % 2 == 0, n/2, nn = n\2; d = digits(nn); nn - sum(i=1, #d, d[i]);); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Aug 14 2013
results.author: Marcel Hetkowski Fabeny (marcelfabeny(AT)yahoo.com.br), Dec 04 2009
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 05 2009
